channel.title: [UPDATE] [PI] [Galkons] skillcape emotes do random stuff? [UPDATE]
channel.description:
Hello,
well i need help with adding skillcape emotes, to my pi [exion] source originaly made by xsagi i beleive..
so ive given up trying to do skillcape emotes my self and now i need some1 that has done this before to do it to mine/help do add skillcape emotes to mine can any1 help me?

item.title: [UPDATE] [PI] [Galkons] skillcape emotes do random stuff? [UPDATE]
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

We don’t sell services here.

Read full topic

This is in my playerassistant.java

[code]public boolean wearingCape(int cape) {
int capes[] = {
9747, 9748, 9750, 9751,
9753, 9754, 9756, 9757,
9759, 9760, 9762, 9763,

9813
};
for(int i = 0; i < capes.length; i++) {
if(capes[i] == cape) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public int skillcapeGfx(int cape) {
int capeGfx[][] = {
{9747, 823}, {9748, 823},

{9813, 816}
};
for(int i = 0; i < capeGfx.length; i++) {
if(capeGfx[i][0] == cape) {
return capeGfx[i][1];
}
}
return -1;
}

public int skillcapeEmote(int cape) {
int capeEmote[][] = {
{9747, 4959}, {9748, 4959},
{9750, 4981}, {9751, 4981},

return capeEmote[i][1];
}
}
return -1;
} [/code]

item.title: [UPDATE] [PI] [Galkons] skillcape emotes do random stuff? [UPDATE]
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

It’s exactly what you’re looking for

int capeEmote[][] = { {9747, 4959},

That means for whatever cape with the ID 9747, give it the emote 4959 for when a player hits the skillcape emote icon.

And under the GFX method

int capeGfx[][] = { {9747, 823},

You’ll notice we’re still on cape 9747 (attack cape non trimmed I think), give it gfx 823. You just need to find the cape ID you want, and change it’s GFX and emote under these lists.
